entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 08:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this morning then west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
